name: 3 vs. the Letters
description:
Save your friends from the evil letters!

Your friends have been captured by the evil letters, and it's up to 3 to save them!

  •  Arrow keys to move
  • 3 levels, each with 3 friends to save.
  • Unique enemies, each with different attributes.
